about.summary: Additional annotations, stats, geoms and scales for plotting  "light" spectra with 'ggplot2', together with specializations of ggplot() and autoplot() methods for spectral data and waveband definitions stored in objects of classes defined in package 'photobiology'. Part of the  'r4photobiology' suite, Aphalo P. J. (2015) <doi:10.19232/uv4pb.2015.1.14>.

name: r-ggspectra
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.3.3.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ggspectra
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ggspectra_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ggspectra/ggspectra_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6775d36b1e5b4e1218313c7b36ab898c09e41be16aeaf40b3c67fce42b519757

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{posix}}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-dplyr >=0.8.0.1
    - r-ggplot2 >=3.1.0
    - r-ggrepel >=0.8.0
    - r-lubridate >=1.7.4
    - r-photobiology >=0.9.26
    - r-photobiologywavebands >=0.4.2
    - r-scales >=1.0.0
    - r-tidyr >=0.8.2
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-dplyr >=0.8.0.1
    - r-ggplot2 >=3.1.0
    - r-ggrepel >=0.8.0
    - r-lubridate >=1.7.4
    - r-photobiology >=0.9.26
    - r-photobiologywavebands >=0.4.2
    - r-scales >=1.0.0
    - r-tidyr >=0.8.2

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ggspectra')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ggspectra')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://www.r4photobiology.info, https://bitbucket.org/aphalo/ggspectra
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: Additional annotations, stats, geoms and scales for plotting  "light" spectra with
    'ggplot2', together with specializations of ggplot() and autoplot() methods for
    spectral data and waveband definitions stored in objects of classes defined in package
    'photobiology'. Part of the  'r4photobiology' suite, Aphalo P. J. (2015) <doi:10.19232/uv4pb.2015.1.14>.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: ggspectra
# Type: Package
# Title: Extensions to 'ggplot2' for Radiation Spectra
# Version: 0.3.2
# Date: 2019-02-19
# Authors@R:  c( person("Pedro J.", "Aphalo", email = "pedro.aphalo@helsinki.fi", role = c("aut", "cre"), comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0003-3385-972X")), person("Titta K.", "Kotilainen", role = "ctb", comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0002-2822-9734")) )
# Maintainer: Pedro J. Aphalo <pedro.aphalo@helsinki.fi>
# Description: Additional annotations, stats, geoms and scales for plotting  "light" spectra with 'ggplot2', together with specializations of ggplot() and autoplot() methods for spectral data and waveband definitions stored in objects of classes defined in package 'photobiology'. Part of the  'r4photobiology' suite, Aphalo P. J. (2015) <doi:10.19232/uv4pb.2015.1.14>.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# LazyData: TRUE
# LazyLoad: TRUE
# ByteCompile: TRUE
# Depends: R (>= 3.4.0), photobiology (>= 0.9.26), ggplot2 (>= 3.1.0)
# Imports: photobiologyWavebands (>= 0.4.2), scales (>= 1.0.0), ggrepel (>= 0.8.0), dplyr (>= 0.8.0.1), lubridate (>= 1.7.4), tidyr (>= 0.8.2)
# Suggests: knitr (>= 1.21), rmarkdown (>= 1.11)
